---
title: Data Dictionary
---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
library(knitr)
library(readr)

read_csv("kaggle/input/equity-post-HCT-survival-predictions/data_dictionary.csv") |>
    kable(caption = "Data Dictionary")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr .hidden}

```

```
